name: Lumines Remastered
overview: Sound, light, puzzle-action! The critically-acclaimed puzzle game produced by legendary creator Tetsuya Mizuguchi arrives on the Nintendo Switch! An HD remaster of the original game, LUMINES REMASTERED beautifully marries the elements of sound, light, and puzzle-action into one addictive, yet easy-to-play game. You're at the center of the high-energy, block-dropping action while you groove to awesome house, trance, and techno beats! Play LUMINES REMASTERED on-the-go in Handheld mode or at home in TV and Tabletop modes.
